[Home](./index.md) &gt; [yorkie-js-sdk](./yorkie-js-sdk.md) &gt; [JSONObject](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.md)

## JSONObject class

`JSONObject` represents a JSON object, but unlike regular JSON, it has time tickets which is created by logical clock.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JSONObject 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [create(createdAt)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.create.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>create</code> creates a new instance of Object. |
|  [createCounter(key, value)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.createcounter.md) |  | Don't use createCounter directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the CounterProxy type as the return value is to provide the CounterProxy interface to the user. |
|  [createRichText(key)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.createrichtext.md) |  | Don't use createRichText directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the RichText type as the return value is to provide the RichText interface to the user. |
|  [createText(key)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.createtext.md) |  | Don't use createText directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the PlainText type as the return value is to provide the PlainText interface to the user. |
|  [deepcopy()](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.deepcopy.md) |  | <code>deepcopy</code> copies itself deeply. |
|  [delete(createdAt, executedAt)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.delete.md) |  | <code>delete</code> deletes the element of the given key. |
|  [deleteByKey(key, executedAt)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.deletebykey.md) |  | <code>deleteByKey</code> deletes the element of the given key and execution time. |
|  [get(key)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.get.md) |  | <code>get</code> returns the value of the given key. |
|  [getDescendants(callback)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.getdescendants.md) |  | <code>getDescendants</code> returns the descendants of this object by traversing. |
|  [getKeys()](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.getkeys.md) |  | <code>getKeys</code> returns array of this object. |
|  [getRHT()](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.getrht.md) |  | <code>getRHT</code> RHTNodes returns the RHTPQMap nodes. |
|  [has(key)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.has.md) |  | <code>has</code> returns whether the element exists of the given key or not. |
|  [keyOf(createdAt)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.keyof.md) |  | <code>keyOf</code> returns a key of RHTPQMap based on the given creation time. |
|  [purge(value)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.purge.md) |  | <code>purge</code> physically purges child element. |
|  [set(key, value)](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.set.md) |  | <code>set</code> sets the given element of the given key. |
|  [toJSON()](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.tojson.md) |  | <code>toJSON</code> returns the JSON encoding of this object. |
|  [toSortedJSON()](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.tosortedjson.md) |  | <code>toSortedJSON</code> returns the sorted JSON encoding of this object. |
